alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 4:09PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Placer, Sierra, Nevada and southern Washoe Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 406 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boca Reservoir, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall and wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Watch for ponding and poor visibility on Interstate 80 between Truckee and the California-Nevada state line. Locations impacted include... Boca Reservoir, Glenshire-Devonshire Cdp, Hirschdale, Floriston, Truckee, Boca Campground, Glenshire-Devonshire and Boca Rest Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
